programme.title: Lubuk S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Rancangan khas yang akan membawa anda ke tempat menarik dari sungai hinggalah ke tempat tersembunyi untuk memancing. Kali ni, kita ke lubuk memancing di sekitar daerah Tanjung Karang bersama Joe Aziz.

programme.title: Ekspresi Fesyen S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Ekspresi Fesyen minggu ini host Aqilah Azali akan berbual fesyen bersama Mawi dari kumpulan Masdo. Akan berkenalan dengan pereka kasut dari perfect duo juga kita akan disajikan dengan segala macam info yang menarik tentang Fesyen.

programme.title: Accidental Detective
programme.desc: Apabila rakan biasa mereka menjadi suspek utama dalam kes pembunuhan, seorang detektif dan pakar dalam jenayah sebenar bersatu untuk menyelesaikan kes dan mencaripelakusebenar.

programme.title: Losmen Melati Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Di pinggir Jawa, Indonesia, pengembara dari dekat dan jauh meninjau sesuatu yang aneh dan misteri. sebuah keluarga yang mencari tempat tinggal selepas pengebumian nenek mereka dan pasangan muda bercinta mencari tempat untuk bermalam bersama. Walau bagaimanapun, perkara-perkara tidak seperti yang mereka nampak di losmen

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Seorang wanita hamil pulang ke rumah keluarga datuk dan neneknya yang baru meninggal dunia untuk meluangkan masa bersama ibunya yang terasing. Apa yang bermula sebagai perjumpaan bertukar menjadi menakutkan.

programme.title: Hi5teria
programme.desc: Lima cerita berbeza tentang misteri yang pasti. Labirin Pasar Setan a.k.a "Pasar Syaitan" gunung, misteri di luar pertunjukan Wayang Kulit, kutukan Music Box, kultus Palasik dan penebusan di Loket Letak Kereta

programme.title: Duel: The Last Choice
programme.desc: Seorang samseng yang sudah bersara mendapati dirinya kembali ke dunia jenayah apabila sekumpulan bekas ahli geng menyerangnya dan membunuh isterinya. Bersama-sama dengan anaknya, dia berangkat untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Accidental Detective
programme.desc: Apabila rakan biasa mereka menjadi suspek utama dalam kes pembunuhan, seorang detektif dan pakar dalam jenayah sebenar bersatu untuk menyelesaikan kes dan mencaripelakusebenar.

programme.title: Ratu Ilmu Hitam
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga diganggu di rumah anak yatim. Seseorang mahu mereka mati, dengan ilmu hitam yang sangat mematikan. Dia mempunyai dendam dan dia juga dilahirkan kerana dosa anak-anak yatim yang membentuknya menjadi Ratu Ilmu Hitam.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Ramai mempercayai bahawa sesebuah tempat atau lokasi itu dikatakan berpuaka setelah berlaku sesuatu tragedi yang melibatkan kematian atau kawasan yang telah lama ditinggalkan. Alam mistik sering menjadi sebuah topik yang subjektif dan menjadi perbalahan dikalangan masyarakat kerana masing-masing mempunyai perspektif yang berbeza-beza terutama sekali di kalangan ahli-ahli kumpulan paranormal di Malaysia mahupun di luar negara. Antara tempat-tempat yang sering menerima kunjungan kumpulan-kumpulan paranormal tempatan adalah seperti Balai Gombak, Highland Towers, Villa Nabila, Apartment Riviera II, Taman RekreasiMimalanddi Gombak dan banyak lagi.

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: Mengenai pasangan muda yang miskin bekerja sebagai pembunuh upahan sehingga mereka diberi tugasan terbaru untuk menghapuskan abang isteri sendiri yang memaksa mereka lari dan bersembunyi daripada kumpulan itu untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bayi mereka.

programme.title: Accidental Detective
programme.desc: Apabila rakan biasa mereka menjadi suspek utama dalam kes pembunuhan, seorang detektif dan pakar dalam jenayah sebenar bersatu untuk menyelesaikan kes dan mencaripelakusebenar.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel dan Cynthia, pasangan muda dengan anak dalam perjalanan, mengalami masa sukar di Manila. Mereka kembali ke Baguio, tempat asal Daniel, untuk memulakan semula. Melalui kebaikan Alex, kawan Daniel zaman kanak-kanak yang kaya, mereka dapat tinggal di sebuah rumah besar, tanpa sewa; dan dia mendapat tawaran kerja juga. Segala-galanya seolah-olah jatuh pada tempatnya untuk mereka - atau begitulah yang mereka fikirkan - sehingga perkara aneh mula berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Rambo Last Blood
programme.desc: Kehidupan damai John Rambo terganggu apabila Gabriela, cucu kawannya, hilang di Mexico. Dia memutuskan untuk membebaskannya daripada cengkaman kartel tempatan, memulakan kitaran membalas dendam.

programme.title: Khun Pan
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Sindiket
programme.desc: Diilhamkan daripada kisah benar, ia memaparkan sindiket pemerdagangan manusia dan menceritakan kisah seorang wanita yang ditipu oleh teman lelakinya. Dia telah dijual ke rumah pelacuran di mana dia dibius dan dipaksa untuk menjual dirinya.

programme.title: Mantera
programme.desc: MANTERA mengisahkan seorang pelajar kolej bernama Azman (lakonan Tomok) yang telah menemui sepasang sarung tangan berteknologi nano yang mampu mengubah motosikal menjadi sut robot yang berkuasa. Pihak musuh juga sebenarnya memburu benda tersebut dengan misi untuk merampas MANTERA seterusnya menakluki dunia.

programme.title: Zohak
programme.desc: Rustem ditangkap pada suatu petang oleh Jin yang sangat berbahaya. Selepas membunuh isterinya di hadapan anak perempuannya yang berusia enam tahun Canan, dia memenjarakan Jin dalam kotak dan membuangnya jauh ke dalam tasik. Tidak tahan dengan kesilapannya, Rustem membunuh dirinya di hadapan anak perempuannya. Canan, yang cuba melupakan apa yang dialaminya selama ini, sedang membuat persiapan untuk berkahwin dengan menjalinkan cinta yang hebat dengan Semih. Dia memberikan Canan sebuah kotak yang rakan-rakannya secara tidak sengaja ditemui di tepi tasik sebagai hadiah hari jadi, dan keadaan menjadiluarbiasa.

programme.title: 4 Tahun Tinggal Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat

programme.title: Khun Pan
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pemenang cabutan bertuah memenangi percutian impian di resort pulau yang kelihatan indah, hanya untuk mendapati diri mereka terperangkap di pulau yang dipenuhi ular maut.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Ramai mempercayai bahawa sesebuah tempat atau lokasi itu dikatakan berpuaka setelah berlaku sesuatu tragedi yang melibatkan kematian atau kawasan yang telah lama ditinggalkan. Alam mistik sering menjadi sebuah topik yang subjektif dan menjadi perbalahan dikalangan masyarakat kerana masing-masing mempunyai perspektif yang berbeza-beza terutama sekali di kalangan ahli-ahli kumpulan paranormal di Malaysia mahupun di luar negara. Antara tempat-tempat yang sering menerima kunjungan kumpulan-kumpulan paranormal tempatan adalah seperti Balai Gombak, Highland Towers, Villa Nabila, Apartment Riviera II, Taman RekreasiMimalanddi Gombak dan banyak lagi.

programme.title: Anak Jantan
programme.desc: Anak Jantan menceritakan kisah Darin yang dihantui oleh kehidupan yang lalu. Gaya hidup negatifnya berubah sama sekali apabila beliau jatuh cinta kepada seorang wanita dari kampungnya bernama Nara. Tidak lama kemudian, pasangan ini berhijrah ke bandar KL untuk memulakan kehidupan baru. Mereka dikurniakan seorang anak lelaki yang bijak bernama Saufi. Malangnya, kebahagiaan keluarga mereka tidak bertahan lama dengan ketibaan Somchai, seorang rakan lama yang kembali menyebabkan pergolakan di tempat kerja Darin.

programme.title: Losmen Melati Ep 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Apabila seorang pemandu trak tunda ditemui mati dan seorang lagi hilang, Detektif Fadil dari polis tempatan mula mengaitkan kes terbarunya dengan Melati Inn. Dia menjalankan siasatan dan menghantar orang bawahannya, Osman, untuk menyamar untuk membongkar kebenaran di rumah penginapan itu. Bagaimanapun, Osman hilang, dan Fadil mengikutnya ke rumah penginapan. Dalam perjalanan, dia melihat figura gelap di hadapan dan merempuhnya, menyedari bahawa sesuatu yang penting sedang berlaku.

programme.title: Bangkok Knock Out
programme.desc: Sekumpulan kawan "kelab pertarungan", yang gayanya berbeza dari Muay Thai, Capoeira hingga Kung Fu dan Tai Chi, mesti bergabung tenaga dan berjuang untuk nyawa mereka dalam menyelamatkan seorang rakan yang diculik.

programme.title: Accidental Detective
programme.desc: Apabila rakan biasa mereka menjadi suspek utama dalam kes pembunuhan, seorang detektif dan pakar dalam jenayah sebenar bersatu untuk menyelesaikan kes dan mencaripelakusebenar.

programme.title: Nang Nak
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki pulang ke rumah dari berperang di mana isteri dan anaknya menyambutnya dengan penuh semangat. Tetapi ada sesuatu yang tidak menyenangkan tentang isterinya yang cuba disampaikan oleh rakan karibnya dan orang yang baik kepadanya.

programme.title: The Living Dead
programme.desc: Rompakan yang kecil menjadi huru-hara, apabila pencuri berakhir di istana lama dan menemui sumpahan purba yang melindungi hartanya. Entiti ghaib secara aktif cuba menghalang mereka daripada mencari emas, atau adakah mereka?

programme.title: Janin Tak Berdosa
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri muda Firman dan Julia merancang berbulan madu di Amsterdam selepas Firman mendapat kenaikan pangkat di syarikatnya. Oleh kerana pada masa itu Julia mengandung dan beliau ingin meneruskan percutiannya maka mereka merancang menggugurkan kandungan itu.

programme.title: 4 Tahun Tinggal Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat

programme.title: The Night Sitter
programme.desc: Seorang penipu menyamar sebagai pengasuh kanak-kanak untuk merompak rumah seorang ahli ghaib yang kaya dan anak lelakinya yang masih kecil. Tetapi apabila rakan sejenayahnya tiba, budak lelaki itu memanggil trio ahli sihir yang melayan penjahat itu ke malam kekacauan.

programme.title: Hantu Bungkus Vs Pontianak
programme.desc: Sebuah filem seram komedi lakonan Osman Kering, Rosli Rahman Adam, Fetty Dzul dan Emma Akma

programme.title: Villa Nabila
programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan mengenai pengalaman sebenar buruh kasar yang ditugaskan untuk merobohkan banglo Villa Nabila.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Ramai mempercayai bahawa sesebuah tempat atau lokasi itu dikatakan berpuaka setelah berlaku sesuatu tragedi yang melibatkan kematian atau kawasan yang telah lama ditinggalkan. Alam mistik sering menjadi sebuah topik yang subjektif dan menjadi perbalahan dikalangan masyarakat kerana masing-masing mempunyai perspektif yang berbeza-beza terutama sekali di kalangan ahli-ahli kumpulan paranormal di Malaysia mahupun di luar negara. Antara tempat-tempat yang sering menerima kunjungan kumpulan-kumpulan paranormal tempatan adalah seperti Balai Gombak, Highland Towers, Villa Nabila, Apartment Riviera II, Taman RekreasiMimalanddi Gombak dan banyak lagi.

programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Seorang wanita hamil pulang ke rumah keluarga datuk dan neneknya yang baru meninggal dunia untuk meluangkan masa bersama ibunya yang terasing. Apa yang bermula sebagai perjumpaan bertukar menjadi menakutkan.

programme.title: Ritual
programme.desc: Peter, dan isterinya jenny, serta anak perempuan mereka lisa, dan kekasihnya michael berkelah di satu tempat yang terpencil. Pelbagai perkara seram terjadi sepanjang mereka disana.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pemenang cabutan bertuah memenangi percutian impian di resort pulau yang kelihatan indah, hanya untuk mendapati diri mereka terperangkap di pulau yang dipenuhi ular maut.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep 23 Ep23
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Taxi 2
programme.desc: Duta Jepun sedang melawat Marseilles untuk melihat taktik anti-geng polis bandar. Semasa lawatan itu, bagaimanapun, dia diculik oleh kumpulan yang bekerja untuk yakuza Jepun. Pegawai muda Emilien berazam untuk menyelamatkan duta dan pegawai Petra (teman wanitanya), yang turut diculik, dan memulihkan kehormatan jabatannya. Sekali lagi, pemandu teksi syaitan laju Daniel (dari filem Teksi pertama) dipanggil untuk menyelamatkan hari dengan kemahiran memandu lajunya.

programme.title: Lurah Dendam
programme.desc: Sekumpulan ahli payung terjun yang diketuai Kapten Hanafi dalam penerbangan untuk membuat penerjunan di Kuantan. Kapal terbang yang mereka naiki terlanggar seekor burung helang dan mengakibatkan pesawat itu bergegar. Dalam keadaan kelam kabut itu, seorang demi seorang penerjun melompat keluar dan mendarat di sebuah kawasan hutan. Di sana, mereka diganggu pelbagai peristiwa dan menganggap tempat itu berpuaka. Namun, Kapten Hanafi mengesyaki semua peristiwa itu adalah berpunca daripada perbuatan manusia.

programme.title: Pasung Puaka
programme.desc: Di sebuah kampung bernama Batu Rakit terdapat sebuah pasung yang digunakan untuk menghukum orang yang bersalah. Penghulu di kampung itu bernama Tok Kajai. Gadek, orang kanan Tok Kajai sering membuat onar dan cuba menggulingkannya. Pada suatu hari, seorang pemuda bernama Wira datang ke kampung itu dan sering menolong orang-orang yang teraniaya. Wira kemudiannya dilantik sebagai penolong Tok Kajai dan perkara ini telah membuatkan Gadek merasa tercabar. Gadek dan konco-konconya cuba merancang sesuatu agar Wira dapat dihukum dengan cara dipasung.

programme.title: Kumpulan O
programme.desc: Sekumpulan saintis berjaya mencipta sebuah formula bagi menggantikan minyak petrol untuk menggerakkan kereta. Walau bagaimanapun, kegembiraan mereka tidak kekal lama apabila formula tersebut telah dicuri oleh sekumpulan penjahat. Mereka cuba memburu serta mendapatkan semula formula itu daripada jatuh ke tangan orang yang tidak bertanggungjawab.

programme.title: Raja Laut
programme.desc: Para pelaut sering terancam dengan kegiatan seorang lanun bernama Raja Laut yang sering melakukan keganasan. Oleh kerana Raja Laut sangat licik dalam kegiatan haramnya, pihak berkuasa mengalami kesukaran untuk memberkasnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Raja Laut telah menjalinkan hubungan dengan adik seorang pegawai tentera laut yang menyukarkan lagi pihak berkuasa untuk menangkapnya.

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas ditugaskan untuk menghapuskan sindiket pengedaran VCD haram dan pil khayal yang didalangi dua kumpulan. Dalam masa yang sama Inspektor Shafikah telah ditugaskan untuk membantu siasatan tersebut. Kehadiran Inspektor Shafikah disenangi oleh semua anggota unit terutamanya Inspektor Mazlan. Hal ini menimbulkan rasa cemburu Inspektor Aleza namun atas misi menghancurkan dua kumpulan penjenayah itu, dia mengenepikan soal peribadi.

programme.title: Lurah Dendam
programme.desc: Sekumpulan ahli payung terjun yang diketuai Kapten Hanafi dalam penerbangan untuk membuat penerjunan di Kuantan. Kapal terbang yang mereka naiki terlanggar seekor burung helang dan mengakibatkan pesawat itu bergegar. Dalam keadaan kelam kabut itu, seorang demi seorang penerjun melompat keluar dan mendarat di sebuah kawasan hutan. Di sana, mereka diganggu pelbagai peristiwa dan menganggap tempat itu berpuaka. Namun, Kapten Hanafi mengesyaki semua peristiwa itu adalah berpunca daripada perbuatan manusia.

programme.title: Jaket Biru
programme.desc: Untuk menumpaskan sebuah kumpulan penyeludupan anak gadis ke luar negara, pihak polis telah menubuhkan sebuah pasukan rahsia yang bernama Jaket Biru. Pasukan yang diketuai oleh Azizan itu ditugaskan untuk melakukan intipan dengan menyertai aktiviti haram tersebut.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Zack dan Sham berkongsi minat yang sama iaitu perlumbaan kereta drift. Dalam masa yang sama, Zack menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Fasha, seorang wanita yang turut mempunyai minat yang mendalam terhadap perlumbaan kereta drift. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan mereka menjadi semakin dingin kerana Zack sering mengongkong hidup Fasha. Sham cuba untuk mendamaikan mereka berdua tetapi timbul pula bibit-bibit cinta antara dia dengan Fasha.

programme.title: Ribut Di Hujung Senja
programme.desc: Andak dan seorang kawannya yang baru tiba di Pulau Segara untuk mencari akar kayu. Mereka telah diserang oleh sekumpulan samseng yang diketuai oleh Jalong sehingga mengakibatkan kematian kawannya. Penghulu telah memerintahkan supaya Andak dikurung sebelum hukuman dijatuhkan. Pada suatu malam, Antoi, anak gadis Penghulu memberi sedikit makanan kepada Andak kerana bersimpati dengan nasibnya. Apabila mendapat tahu perkara ini, Jalong berasa sakit hati kerana dia menaruh hati kepada Antoi namun tidak diendahkan. Atas nasihat anak lelakinya, Uda, Penghulu membuat satu pertandingan di antara Andak dengan Jalong untuk menentukan siapakah yang benar.

programme.title: Pecah
programme.desc: Empat orang lelaki berjaya merompak sebuah bank tetapi malangnya salah seorang daripada mereka cedera dan terpaksa dirawat di hospital. Pada masa yang sama, seorang wanita yang menjaga orang tua di sebuah rumah orang tua, membawa salah seorang penghuninya ke hospital yang sama untuk mendapatkan rawatan. Apa yang berlaku kemudiannya ialah pembongkaran demi pembongkaran agenda tersembunyi, di samping penyiasatan daripada pihak polis pada masa yang sama.

programme.title: Burung Besi
programme.desc: Azri, seorang remaja yang pintar suka bermain kapal terbang kawalan jarak jauh milik ayahnya. Dia memasang kamera pegun yang membolehkannya mengambil gambar setiap 10 saat. Gambar yang diambil olehnya telah membawanya kepada kegiatan penyeludupan milik My Lady. My Lady cuba untuk menghapuskan Azri dan rakannya supaya dia boleh kekal beroperasi.

programme.title: Sumpah Semerah Padi
programme.desc: Sebuah daerah bernama Semerah Padi berada dalam keadaan aman damai di bawah pemerintahan Demang Satria. Namun, keadaan menjadi kucar kacir apabila Semerah Padi diserang oleh sekumpulan pengganas. Demang Satria mati dibunuh manakala isteri dan anak-anaknya dihalau keluar daripada Semerah Padi. Adi Putera, anak lelaki Demang Satria ialah seorang pemuda yang taat pada agama namun tidak memiliki keberanian untuk mempertahankan diri. Dia menuntut ilmu persilatan dengan Andika. Adi Putera bertekad untuk membalas dendam serta kembali memerintah Semerah Padi dengan ajaran Islam.

programme.title: Pelumba Malam
programme.desc: Ketika masih kecil, Jeff menyaksikan kes pembunuhan bapanya yang dilakukan oleh Rizal. Untuk menjejaki pembunuh bapanya, Jeff menyertai kumpulan pelumba haram yang didalangi Rizal untuk mendapatkan bukti. Ketika menyertai Kumpulan itu, Jeff bertemu Tini, kekasih Zul yang menjadi orang kanan Rizal. Dalam masa yang sama, Jeff berkenalan dengan Ema namun merahsiakan misinya untuk memburu Rizal. Jeff ingin membongkarkan kesemua kegiatan jenayah Rizal serta mengheretnya ke muka pengadilan.

programme.title: Evolusi KL Drift
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Zack dan Sham berkongsi minat yang sama iaitu perlumbaan kereta drift. programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Cigu! Nadai Bisi Utai Ep5
programme.desc: Halim, seorang guru muda lepasan maktab berusia 25 tahun dari Selangor, dilema menerima tawaran mengajar di sekolah rendah di pedalaman Sarawak. Ibu dan tunang menentang, tetapi bapanya menyokong. Dalam tempoh 30 hari, Halim berusaha memenuhi syarat melapor diri. Di Sarawak, dia menghadapi kesukaran pengangkutan dan penginapan, serta kemalangan,namun...

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: 8x3 Ep13
programme.desc: "8x3" is a 13-episode drama series featuring three 8-minute stories about ordinary people in a city, highlighting their connections through blood ties, friendships, and experiences.

programme.title: Ajaib Ep5
programme.desc: Dunia koma Jasmin dan mimpi Maliq mempertemukan mereka dalam satu dunia lain, yang akhirnya membuatkan mereka menjalinkan cinta. Pertemuan di dunia fantasi, akhirnya menyatukan mereka di dunia realiti

programme.title: Hustle Hasil S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Kraftangan Sarawak is a show where local Sarawaks craft becomes the focal point and in each episode, the host (Arabyrd) goes in depth with different form of local craft and its practicioner.

programme.title: Halik Ep27
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Descendent of The Sun Ep8
programme.desc: This drama tells of the love story that develops between a surgeon and a special forces officer.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@4:55
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Sarawak Panorama S2 Ep1
programme.desc: A country without a documentary is like a family without an album. Sarawak Panorama is the family album that my team and I whole heartedly and passionately dedicate to our beloved Sarawak.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: The Amazing Awang Khenit Ep14
programme.desc: The Amazing Awang Khenit menceritakan kisah seorang budak lelaki bernama Awang yang tinggal di sebuah negeri bernama Indrasakti.

programme.title: A Day With Champion Ep2
programme.desc: This documentary follows six Sarawakianathletes in various types of sports, all at different stages in their career, and the different challenges they face.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Cooking Orang Bujang S2 Ep13
programme.desc: FattahBolh akan menunjukkan menu masakan orang bujang yang sedap dan mudah untuk dicuba golongan masyarakat. Anda pasti teruja dengan nama & masakan yang mudah untuk dijadikan sebagai panduan orang ramai.

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh

programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditugaskan untuk menentang penjenayah yang bermaharajalela dan bertindak zalim terhadap penduduk kampung . Pengembaraan tersebut dilalui dengan pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja terpaksa berhadapan dengan penjenayah malah pemimpin yang menyalahgunakan kuasa dalam menjalankan tugas yang diamanahkan

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Tuju-Tuju
programme.desc: Dr Eddy, Dr Suzana, Luthya dan Vanessa tiba di Kampung Parit Polong untuk menyelesaikan misteri sumpahan yang menimpa kampung itu.

programme.title: Tmo Paku Pontianak
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Paku Pontianak

programme.title: Art Idol
programme.desc: Art adalah seorang budak muda yang mencari kemasyhuran, tetapi dia tidak pasti sama ada dia mempunyai bakat untuk itu. Foon, seorang gadis muda benar-benar bertentangan dengan Art. Dia tahu apa yang dia mahukan dan sedang mencapai matlamatnya. Foon mempunyai perasaan terhadap Art, tetapi adakah Art akan mengetahuinya?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Validasi
programme.desc: Nina dan Muna selalu bertengkar di media sosial untuk melihat siapa yang mempunyai pengikut yang lebih tinggi dan siapa yang mengumpul like yang lebih banyak. Persaingan mereka bertukar menjadi buruk apabila sikap buruk Nina dan Muna mula terbongkar.

programme.title: Pening-Pening Lalat
programme.desc: Dino adalah banduan yang berjaya melarikan diri dari penjara. Polis menyiarkan berita mengenainya dan menawarkan hadiah RM10,000 kepada sesiapa yang berjaya menangkapnya. Jadi Dino bersembunyi di dalam hutan di mana dia bertemu Zakaria dan Aliza.

programme.title: Hidup Lagi Capek Capeknya Justru Ketemu Mbanya
programme.desc: Arif yang menjual tebu sering kali dibantu oleh Nella supaya tidak dihalau. Nella, yang bekerja sebagai pegawai polis perbandaran, nampaknya mula jatuh hati kepada penjual jus tebu

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep124
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep35
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi
programme.desc: Nikmati keseronokan bersama dengan menyanyi dan bergoyang di Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi bersama barisan bintang terkenal dan hos yang mengujakan.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep59
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Derita Kakek Tukang Pijat Tunanetra Yang Bermimpi Pergi Ke Baitullah
programme.desc: Pak Hasan sangat bertuah mempunyai anak seperti Ridho yang berbakti kepadanya. Tetapi Ridho merasa kasihan kerana isterinya sentiasa mengambil wang Pak Hasan hasil daripada urutan, walaupun wang tersebut adalah untuk impian Pak Hasan pergi ke tanah suci. Apakah yang berlaku selepas ini?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep125
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep44
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Jatuh Bangun Ibu Ojek Online Hingga Menjadi Pengusaha
programme.desc: Sejak suaminya meninggal, Winda terpaksa berhempas pulas mencari wang untuk meneruskan kehidupan bersama anaknya. Walaupun dia seorang wanita, Winda sanggup menjadi pemandu teksi motosikal dalam talian. Dia harus menanggung semua kepahitan hidup dengan kesabaran sehingga dia dapat menjadi seorang usahawan yang berjaya.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep126
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. programme.title: Dituduh Pelakor Bikin Nyenyenye
programme.desc: Ternyata gadis yang didakwanya itu bukanlah gadis biasa. Lama-kelamaan, dia mula menyukai gadis ini sehingga dia berada dalam keadaan tidak selesa sebagai pihak ketiga antara gadis itu dan kawan baiknya. Apakah yang akan berlaku seterusnya?

programme.title: Cewek Disaster Paham Cara FYP Di Hatiku
programme.desc: Pada mulanya, Lisna ingin membantu rakan baiknya, Nuri, kerana teman lelaki Nuri meninggalkannya dan berkahwin lain. Bagaimanapun, ia adalah salah faham, dan kini Lisna menjadi viral kerana dia merempuh perkahwinan selebriti terkenal.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep19
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep1
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep2
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep24
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep62
programme.desc: LIDA 2021 ialah rancangan hiburan Dangdut terbesar dan no 1 di Indonesia. LIDA 2021 merupakan musim keempat Liga Dangdut Indonesia dan pemenang musim ini juga dijangka menjadi generasi dangdut Indonesia seterusnya.

programme.title: Dari Dendam Turun Ke Hati
programme.desc: Vanessa merupakan seorang pelajar kolej yang sedang mencari ayahnya yang telah lama hilang. Dengan bantuan rakannya, Putra, Vanessa berusaha mencari ayahnya.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep127
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep15
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: During the extradition to Korea, a group of dangerous criminals united to stage an escape from the floating prison.

programme.title: Cobweb
programme.desc: Director Kim has completed filming Cobweb, but he decided to re-shoot the ending. With chaos and people don't understand the new ending, will Kim be able to complete his masterpiece?

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: A Man Of Reason
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a man learns that he has a daughter, thus wishes to leave the gangs and live an ordinary life. Yet the new leader of the gangs feels being betrayed...

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: During the extradition to Korea, a group of dangerous criminals united to stage an escape from the floating prison.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a womans three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: Tazza: The Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep34
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2181
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3801
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2182

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep203
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3421
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48564857
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1038
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep36
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2887
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1038
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep6
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep279280
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep494
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep67
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Island of Fire
programme.desc: A cop goes undercover in a prison to find a murderer. When the prison warden enrols him and other inmates for a secret mission, he finally finds the murderer.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Flying Dragon Leaping Tiger
programme.desc: Lu the horse thief is betrayed by his best mate Qiao and is separated from his son. Lus wife blames him for it and takes Qiaos daughter away as revenge. For 20 years, Lu searches for his wife until one day, his missing son meets Qiaos daughter and they fall in love. Will their hatred pass on to the next generation?

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard (Nick Cheung) but suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ais feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: The New Legend of Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin disciple Hong Xi Guan is tasked to escort the five young shaolin legends who have treasure maps tattooed on their backs to the base of the Anti-Qing Society. They are targeted and hunted by an assassin sent by the Qing government. Can Hong finally keep them safe and complete his mission?

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
programme.desc: The sequel to "Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons", this happens after Monkey King has gained enlightenment and is Tang San Zang's disciple. Tang, Monkey King, Sandy and Pigsy continue their journey to the West, where they have to fight and eliminate demons while dealing with their own changes, putting their bond to the test.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiance Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Lady Is The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dongs songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Swordsman And Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully on their masters birthday.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The Spirit Of The Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: Tamil Coming-of-Age Comedy Film, Starring, Siva Karthikeyan, Bindhu Mathavi, Vimal, Soori & Regina Cassandra

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Vishal, Samantha Akkineni, Arjun Sarja, Sreeja Ravi & others

programme.title: Thangaraja
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Nagarjuna, Ramya Krishna, Naga Chaitanya and Krithi Shetty.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Tamil Musical Dance Film, Starring, Ditya Bhande, Prabhu Deva, Salman Yusuff Khan, Aishwarya Rajesh, Chaams & Others

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Kurangu Bommai
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Vidharth, Bharathiraja, Delna Davis

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Kaari
programme.desc: Tamil sports action drama film, Starring - M. Sasikumar, Parvathy Arun, J. D. Chakravarthy & Balaji Sakthivel

programme.title: Akashaganga 2
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Thriller Film, Starring, Ramya Krishnan, Veena P. Nair, Vishnu Vinay, and Sreenath Bhasi, Divyaa Unni & Others

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Love Movie, Starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Madonna Sebastian, T. Rajenda, Vikranth, Chandini Tamilarasan & Others

programme.title: Maaman Magal

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect Ep3
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Dry Season Ep4
programme.desc: The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to surviveand if they dont, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Land of the Secret Rhino Ep2
programme.desc: The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on earth. Hundreds of species of tall grass flourish here, allowing one of Indias most iconic creatures to thrive the Greater One-horned Rhino. This is one of the last places on earth where this gentle giant survives. Rani, an adult female has just had a baby, Rajah. This young rhino calf is only 3-month-old and his mom is his teacher, for the first year and half of his life. Rajah has much to learn, as he gets to grips with the world around him and everything there is to know about being a rhino.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Juniors Ep5
programme.desc: Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Wild Stallions of the Himalayas Ep3
programme.desc: The high altitude Ladakh plateau in northwest India is a land of extremes. The air is thin and the mountain landscape treacherous; winters are freezing, while summers are scorching hot. The Tibetan wild ass is king of these grasslands, and one old stallion has developed a way to stay one step ahead of his rivals. We follow Dorje as he shadows a herd of females and foals, from winter to summer, when he will get his chance to sire the next generation. But to win his prize he must eventually do battle with other stallions - all wanting his crown!

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Water Worlds Ep3
programme.desc: Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations Ep4
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.
