programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Waterberg - Mountains of Life Ep1
programme.desc: In the Limpopo region of South Africa lies an ancient land. From rolling grasslands to rocky gorges, wildlife has learnt to make the most of whats on offer. This is the Waterberg, a land of plenty.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Africa's Great Oasis - the Okavango Ep3
programme.desc: Trapped in one of Africas great deserts is a lush, hidden world. It is an untamed wilderness unlike any other on Earth. Fed by a mighty river that travels from distant mountains, it is a vast mosaic of life, which pulsates with vivid beauty.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Kalahari Ep5
programme.desc: An immense, dry land dominates southwestern Africa. Here, sand covers the land in rippling dunes and rain drains away as quickly as it falls. Kalahari, meaning "place of great thirst," is an appropriate name for one of southern Africas greatest wildernesses.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sweeping Shores Ep1
programme.desc: The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Simien Mountains Ep3
programme.desc: Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2016
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2016 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Animals - All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm. And this time he makes sure the farm gate is shut properly! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep32
programme.desc: Turboldy Go Part 1/Part 2 - A mix-up puts the FAST crew on a rocket bound for outer space; The crew must work together to avoid space madness, debris ... and a fiery re-entry.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep32
programme.desc: Blayde - Dozer and the crew must find a way to outsmart a clever bully named Blayde, a new ememy who kidnapped George and destroyed the Dozeratop mounds

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep66
programme.desc: The Palomino Family Affair - Lucky and Bebe spend the weekend pretending to be besties when their fathers come for a family visit and reveal that they're old friends.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep67
programme.desc: Back To The Starting Line - As a new term begins, Maricela and her horse, Mystery, arrive at the academy to join Lucky, Pru and Abigail for the school year.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost / Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep58
programme.desc: Return Of Thor Bonecrusher - When Thor Bonecrusher is needed to rescue hostages taken by the Bandits, Snoutlout tries to help but accidentally brings to life Thor's evil twin Anti-Thor who sides with the Bandits

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep58
programme.desc: Bad Year Blimp - King Julien and his team ride sharks to an Island; Clover and Sage get a map that leads to the wisdom they seek; Mort hides in Junk Harbor

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep17
programme.desc: Cleopatra Needs Space - Akila and Brian are having major romance drama and Cleo HAS to get away from it. She gets captured by Space Scavengers, but its still kind of an improvement.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep18
programme.desc: School Break - When Akila invites Cleo home for school break, she has to compete for her parents attention.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep37
programme.desc: The Voltron Show! - With the Galra empire in upheaval Team Voltron realizes that now is the time to unite the galaxy and bring the fight to Zarkon

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep38
programme.desc: Begin The Blitz - With Zarkon consumed by his hunt for Lotor, Voltron gathers their coalition and prepares to strike in hopes of demolishing the evil Empire

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep13
programme.desc: Outbreak/ Ancient Greek Games - Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu turning everyone blue; Zeus's team of titans face off against a gawky geek squad.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep14
programme.desc: Show On The Road/Catherine The Great - Peabody and Sherman try to do the show in a new city but end up on the moon instead and must get home before astronauts take over the penthouse

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep11
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Two - After Bullwinkle drinks a monster serum, he cant control when he turns into a big hairy monster, so he and Rocky go on the run from angry mobs and internet celebrities

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep12
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Three - Bullwinkle and Rocky fly to a mysterious monster-inhabited island to meet the missing mad scientist that created the serum that turned Bullwinkle into a monster, only to learn of the biggest, meanest monster on the island, Humongalon

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep13
programme.desc: The Primrose Classic / The Blimpateers - A professional paper airplane thrower hires Archibald to be his caddie. While floating through the sky, Archibald bumps into birds who live in a blimp.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep14
programme.desc: The Mall Walkers / Treasured Tattoo - Archibald stumbles upon a crime in progress while trapped in the mall overnight. A whale's tattooed map inspires Archibald to go on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep25
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 1 - When El Circo Dos Grillos comes to town, Lucky and Spirit learn circus tricks.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep25
programme.desc: Si - Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep25
programme.desc: Drillasaurs - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep25
programme.desc: Why Flamingo Stands On One Leg - You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi's Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert and the Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep25
programme.desc: The Pawston Chewbilee / Dont Go, Cat. Go! - Based on PD Eastman's classic childrens book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scoochs easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tags high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, shes often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Rules Of The Game - Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab. They were blown there by the wind from the Daisy Mill at the farm. Now the pirates and Pat-Pat can agree on who has won the game and are friends again. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep33
programme.desc: Nepal: Yeti Or Not - When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out its another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep33
programme.desc: Crow Pox/Faking Ammends - A prank leads to "crow pox" for the FAST snails, who make a treacherous climb to find a cure; Burn and her hippie sister try to end their rivalry.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep33
programme.desc: Battle - D-Structs becomes super-charged when Skrap-It installs a special spark bug, so the Trux must find their own spark bug to battle D-Structs' new power

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep33
programme.desc: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish - When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep68
programme.desc: The S. S. Friend-ship - After the PALs encourage Maricela to make new friends, she forms the exclusive "Poshy Posse" with Priya, Sahir and Alex.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep69
programme.desc: The Gavel of Justice - Someone stole Bebe's gavel and used it to break a window at the academy! Everyone seems to suspect Alex ... but Pru is certain he's innocent.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep825
programme.desc: Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel / Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat - Marshall and Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel. // Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Dora S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Meatball Mayhem - When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep410
programme.desc: Robots in Space - When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero / Paddington Needs a Hero - Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous? // Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Dora S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album. // Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Power Tires - When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride / Swimming Solo - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. // Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hippos - Raimundos dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104

Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep307

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep318

programme.desc: Pups Save a Duck Pond - Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep146

programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.desc: Pillow Fill - Scarf Lady helps Sarah & Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pancaked pillows.

programme.desc: Windmill Girl - When the wind blows fast Nora has to go fast, but when the wind blows slow, Nora has great fun speeding up and slowing down with the wind.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Dog Loves Amazing Facts - Dog and Pug are talking facts and they go on an adventure to check one of Pug's facts. In the Fact Wherehouse they meet Wow the Owl who appears to know everything.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Half a Pair - After playing in the mud, Monty and Stan decide to give Jimmy Jones a bath, but when Stan can only find one glove from his pair, he tells Monty that half a pair of something is useless, leading Monty to wonder if there are any other uses for a half of a pair.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep6
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit the Optician - JoJo and Gran Gran take a trip to have JoJo's eyes tested at the opticians. Jaxon and Ezra help explain what it means to be long- and short-sighted.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Movie Night - It's the team's favourite night of the week... movie night! But then the Pizza Delivery Blocker gets in their way!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Good Clean Fun - The high point of a window cleaner's career could be a low point, if Team Tinpo can't help him with his fear of heights.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Bus - During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep52
programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep51
programme.desc: The Action Hero Badge - The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Lake Titicaca, South America - What goes up must come down! Grandmaster Glitch lands with a splash in Lake Titicaca in South America.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Leaning Tower of Pisa, Italy - The Go Jetters race to fix the Leaning Tower of Pisa, but has it really been glitched?

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep41
programme.desc: The Throne Thief - Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Chilli are playing when, suddenly, they hear a scream and discover an upset Evil Pea in her freezer. Her throne has been stolen! Who would do such a thing?

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Broccoli Alone - Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Crazy Golf - Laa-Laa shows Tinky Winky how to play crazy golf. Tinky Winky loves hitting the ball which travels up and down the hills of Teletubbyland and in to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Tiger - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tiger' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a stripy tiger, a swimming tiger, a cheeky tiger and Dee even has a tea party with a tiger!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Floor is Bananas - Helping Hand builds a banana-themed obstacle course. But when Phoebe becomes competitive, she must work with her team to make it over the finish line together.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep3
programme.desc: OKIDO in Bloom - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. The sky is full of big grey rain clouds in the real world. Messy watches his sandcastle outside get washed away by the pouring rain. Why does it have to rain? He competes in the OKIDO flower competition and finds out why.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Beautiful Game - Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they don't have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Markets - When Bluey visits the markets with five bucks from the tooth fairy, the options are endless. But as she and Indy look for the perfect purchase, spending it proves hard.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - Duggee explains why animals all have different voices.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Doctor - Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.desc: Andy and the Hermit Crab - Andy heads to a Caribbean island to track down some hermit crabs and their shells.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep219
programme.desc: The Guru - Aang starts to learn control of the Avatar State from Guru Pathik at the Eastern Air Temple. Sokka is reunited with his father.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: Who R Zoo? / The Kwarantined Krab - SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Super Sitters - Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Are You Smarter Than A Smart Cabin / Deep Sea Despot - In an effort to avoid doing chores, Sandy invents a 'Smart Cabin'. // Squidward takes over as Camp Master.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Majestic 5 / Kitchen Klutz - Papa Smurf holds a special vote to decide who will act as Rescue Smurfs if Gargamel attacks the village. // After Clumsy saves Chef's life, Chef takes Clumsy on as his assistant in the kitchen. It's a catastrophe.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Chef Soup / Adventures in Smurfsitting - When Brainy criticizes Chef's cooking, Chef walks out in a huff and ends up cooking for the Ogres. // When Clumsy and Dimwitty take care of Baby, they try to show all of Smurf Village how smurfsome they really are.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Last Laugh / Driver's Dread - Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act. // Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni ooks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

programme.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Hide and Seek / The First Lou Episode - The trio plays a game of hide and seek that spans the globe and takes decades to complete. // To get their landlord to lower their rent, the trio tries to help him achieve his impossible dream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering - Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep154
programme.desc: The Hot Shot - Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, tries to teach SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep214
programme.desc: City of Walls and Secrets - Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them. Meanwhile, Jet tries to find proof that Zuko and Uncle are Fire Nation.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Alpaca Lies / Rocket Plan - Ronnie Anne and Bobby have to deal with an old friend of Arturo's-Al the Alpaca, but Al has it out for the kids. // Abuelo helps CJ build a rocket, but when things aren't going well, Abuelo tells a little fib to preserve CJ's feelings.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep252
programme.desc: Mind the Gap / Dirty Bubble Returns - Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBob's teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. // The newly reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep164
programme.desc: Pet Sitter Pat - SpongeBob asks Patrick to pet-sit Gary while he's away at his Grandma's birthday party.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Royal Pain - Po takes on the challenge of training a lovable but klutzy member of the Emperor's family. However, will Po's training be enough to protect them both from the evil designs of a traitor in their midst?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Bosom Enemies - After dealing Taotie yet another humiliating defeat, Po is horrified to learn that the villainous warthog has had a full on nervous breakdown. Po is determined to heal his spirit and Taotie is eager to change his evil ways...or is he?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Secret Admirer - When Po's fake love letter prank on Monkey backfires, the duo's relationship is put to the test in a story of jealousy, betrayal and, yes, even kidnapping.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Showdown on Fairway - A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Feline Fervor / Action Reaction - King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. // Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Mental Hen / Thumb Drive - A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future! // The penguins need a thumb, and Maurice's fits the bill nicely.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Siege of the North Part 2 - Zhaos invasion breaks through the outer wall of the Northern Water Tribes defenses, and he reveals a sinister plan.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Avatar State - Aang and the group meet an Earth Kingdom general who wants to use Aang's powerful "Avatar State" as a weapon to defeat the Fire Nation. But getting into the "Avatar state" on purpose is more difficult than Aang thinks.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Cave of Two Lovers - On their way to Omashu, the kids meet a group of nomads who show them a short cut through the 'cave of two lovers'.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert / Something Fishy - The twins go to great lengths to protect Best's enjoyment of his book and realize spoilers aren't so bad after all. // Best and Bester may have jumped the line for the new fish restaurant, but once inside things take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Fair Share / Power Plant - Sharing isn't easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Little Map - Map has been teaching his nephew, Little Map, how to draw pictures that help us on our adventures. And hes getting really good, so today hes ready for his very first treasure adventure!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Stinkboy / Wolfie - Sanjay runs away to live in the sewer when Craig cant handle his stench. // Hectors sudden fascination with wolves gets on Sanjay and Craigs nerves.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep104
programme.desc: OctoCharlotte / Trouble In Tropikini - Schwoz accidentally morphs Charlotte into half girl/half octopus, Captain Man & Kid Danger work to change her back but must catch her first! // The group's vacation is cut short when Jasper falls into a volcano & is held captive by the Volcaniacs.

programme.title: Top Wing S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Banana Bandits / Shirley's Rocket Adventure - Monkey bandits hijack Rhonda's bananas! The Cadets rescue the bananas and Turtle Train when the monkeys strike again. // Shirley accidently turbo-charges her little plane. It takes all of Swift's flying skills to rescue her.

programme.title: Top Wing S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Top Wing's Eggcellent Rescue / The Great Pearl-A-Palooza Caper - Sandy Stork loses her glasses and mixes up the eggs in her delivery. Top Wing race to get the right eggs back home before they hatch! // When Chomps and Rocco take Big Swirl's famous pearls, Top Wing must get them back in time for Pearl-A-Palooza!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep81
programme.desc: Friend Or Foe - Mr. Krabs and Plankton have been business rivals and bitter enemies for longer than anyone can remember.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep123
programme.desc: Truth or Square Part 1 - Its the anniversary of the Krusty Krab! Mr. Krabs calls everyone over early to prepare for the big night. However, a mishap causes the team to get stuck in Krabs freezer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep124
programme.desc: Truth or Square Part 2 - Its the anniversary of the Krusty Krab! Mr. Krabs calls everyone over early to prepare for the big night. However, a mishap causes the team to get stuck in Krabs freezer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep83

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Costa Georgiadis visits a tranquil family retreat, Josh Byrne meets a community of verge gardeners, Jerry Coleby-Williams tours Toowoomba's famous rose garden and Jane Edmanson discovers stunning cool climate classics.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Crowfoot, a Chief of Blackfoot nation, negotiated one of the most controversial treaties in Canadian history and his personal regalia ended up in a British museum. Did colonial forces literally steal the shirt from his back?

programme.title: India Votes 2024 Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - We explore PM Modi's efforts to secure a third term and find out public perceptions of him. Plus we examine the evolving media landscape and the challenges faced by journalists, and hear from the Indian diaspora in Australia.

programme.title: Compass Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 38 - Homegrown Imam is the real-life House of Gods! Sheikh Shadi is changing the face of Islam here. But not everyone agrees with his views, and the biggest test of his leadership comes with the outbreak of the Israel-Gaza war.

programme.title: Planet America Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe Biden speaks at the White House Correspondents' Dinner, the latest testimony from witnesses at Trump's hush money trial, plus protests on campus.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep69
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep89
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Crowfoot, a Chief of Blackfoot nation, negotiated one of the most controversial treaties in Canadian history and his personal regalia ended up in a British museum. Did colonial forces literally steal the shirt from his back?

programme.title: The Pacific Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosts Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the latest reports on news, politics, sport, culture and entertainment from the Pacific. Each week on The Pacific we cover the issues that matter most across the Pacific region.

programme.title: If You're Listening Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Iran and Israel are caught in a cycle of revenge. They retaliate in a way to appease an angry population and deter more attacks without escalating to all-out war. The response may change the trajectory of the Middle East.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep47
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - It's a Showdown to open Round 8. The two South Australian teams the Adelaide Crows and Port Adelaide face off in Thursday Night Footy. The Power have won 5 of their first 6 matches while the Crows won just two and lost 5.

programme.title: The World Ep72
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEST, Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep68
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: The Business Ep56
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep89
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosts Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the latest reports on news, politics, sport, culture and entertainment from the Pacific. Each week on The Pacific we cover the issues that matter most across the Pacific region.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep10

programme.title: India Votes 2024 Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - We delve into how India's religious minorities are voting, we focus on another region of India to see how much it has changed plus how the queer community is now seen as an important new voting bloc. Presented by Hannah Jose.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep8

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: "Show-Stopping Submissions" - Since the very beginning of the UFC, grappling has been put on display in spectacular fashion. On this of UFC Unleashed, weve got a collection of showstopping submissions. Featuring Glover Teixeira, Vicente Luque, Juliana Pena, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC283TeixeiravsHill
programme.desc: t UFC 283, former champion Glover Teixiera and Jamahal Sweet Dreams Hill squared off for the vacant light heavyweight belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their championship bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep512BattlegroundsMarquezMMAFrontRowAjamainSterlingCoachesCornerEricNicksick
programme.desc: John Marquez and Daniel Gracie give us an exclusive look into what makes Marquez MMA and their partnership so special in this of Battlegrounds. We go front row with current Bantamweight Champion Aljamain Sterling at UFC 276 as he watches the third featherweight title fight between Alex Volkanovski vs and Max Holloway. Xtreme Coutures head coach Eric Nicksick opens up about how coaching fighters gave him a second chance.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC297StricklandvsDuPlessis
programme.desc: UFC returns to Toronto with two championship bouts. After an impressive victory over Israel Adesanya, Sean Strickland defends his middleweight belt for the first time against South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis. And in the co-main event, Raquel Pennington and Mayra Bueno Silva battle for the vacant women's bantanweight title. All this and more on Ufc Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1003
programme.desc: Ultimate Knockouts "Hispanic Heritage Month 2023 - UFC Ultimate Knockouts celebrates Hispanic Heritage Month. See Edson Barboza, Polyana Viana, Marlon Vera, and more.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE - A towering presence at the back and a potent attacking force upfront. Complete domination by Barcelona club captain Gerard Pique.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Nicolau vs. Perez
programme.desc: Prelims - Longtime contenders in the ultra-competitive flyweight division, Matheus Nicolau and Alex Perez have never met in the Octagon, but that will change on April 27 when the duo collide in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of bouts over Manel Kape, Tim Elliott, David Dvorak and Matt Schnell since his return to the UFC in 2021, Brazils Nicolau hopes that a win will put him in the championship conversation, but Lemoore, Californias Perez is a former world title challenger who will do whatever it takes to keep Nicolau from getting his hand raised.

programme.desc: Prelims - Over 30 years in the making, UFC 300 is finally here on April 14, complete with three title fights and a card stacked from top to bottom with mixed martial arts biggest stars.
